outline:
1. labour, service
    1. labour, work
    2. labour (of servant or slave)
    3. labour, service (of captives or subjects)
    4. service (of God)
kjv_def: act, bondage, [phrase] bondservant, effect, labour, ministering(-try), office, service(-ile, -itude), tillage, use, work, [idiom] wrought.
